document.full_text: palestinian unity is crucial to peace with israel and the pact between the secular fatah and islamist hamas movements must be given a chance, palestinian prime minister salam fayyad said on friday.
document.title: give unity deal a chance, palestinian pm urges
lines_and_colors: palestinian unity is crucial to peace with israel and the pact between the secular fatah and islamist hamas movements must be given a chance, palestinian prime minister salam fayyad said on friday.
